steps.name: $("by text: Оплата по карте") should be(visible)
$("#root > div > form > fieldset > div:nth-child(4) > button > span") should be(visible)
$("#root > div > form > fieldset > div:nth-child(3) > span > span:nth-child(1) > span > span > span.input__box > input") set value(RAYMON TOY I)
$("#root > div > form > fieldset > div:nth-child(4) > button > span") click()
